entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

entry.title: Hexo Freemind
entry.content:
Freemind aims at fully taking advantages of Bootstrap.

  • Demo
  • Q&A
  • Tag Plugins
  • Color Themes
  • Readme in Chinese

Requirements

  • Hexo >= 3.0
  • hexo-tag-bootstrap >= 0.0.8 (optional)

Features

  • Bootstrap - get the power of Twitter Bootstrap with minimal hassle;
  • Tag plugins - luxuriant Bootstrap tag plugins, provided by hexo-tag-bootstrap, including:
    • textcolor - a paragraph of text with specified color;
    • button - a button with target links, text and specified color;
    • label - a label with text and specified color;
    • badge - a badge with text;
    • alert - alert messages with text and specified color;
  • Local Search Engine - a build-in local search engine, with the help of hexo-generator-search.
  • Color Themes - luxuriant Bootswatch color themes for choice.

Install

1) install theme:

2) install hexo-tag-bootstrap (optional):

3) install hexo-generator-search (optional):

4) Create pages

Freemind offers you the customized Categories, Tags and About pages. But you need to manually create these page at your ‘source’ folder.

For example, to create a Categories page, you may create a index.html file at source/categories/ folder with the following contents:

Tags and About pages are created in a similar way, except that the layouts are tags and page respectively.

Alternatively you can create About page using the following command:

Note that only About page can be created in that way.

Enable

Modify theme setting in your _config.yml to freemind.

Update

Configuration

  • slogan - slogan display at the index page
  • theme - which color theme to use
  • inverse - whether to use inverse navbar color
  • menu - Navigation menu
  • links - reference links at the links widget
  • widgets - Widgets displaying in sidebar
  • rss - RSS link
  • fancybox - Enable Fancybox
  • duoshuo_shortname - DuoShuo ID, if you prefer to use duoshuo instead of Disqus
  • analytics - Analytics ID. Supports both Google Analytics and Baidu Tongji.
  • swiftype_key - Swifttype key to enable local searching. Leave it blank or comment this line if you want to use build-in local search engine.
  • bdshare - Baidu share button at the bottom of article.
  • jiathis - jiathis share button at the bottom of article.

If you prefer to use disqus, the setting of disqus should be placed at your root _config.yml:

Front-Matter

There are some new front-matter settings in Freemind that you can use to decorate your articles.

  • description - a short description about the articles that will be display at the top of the post
  • feature - sets a feature image that will be show at the index page
  • toc - renders a table of contents

For example:

License

This theme is provided under MIT License.

People Using Freemind

see Examples.

Credits

  • The theme is built based on Twitter-Bootstrap 3.1.1;
  • The beautiful icons are from Font Awesome.
  • Build-in color themes are from Bootswatch.
entry.summary: Freemind aims at fully taking adva

entry.title: Questions and Answers
entry.content:
Q What does Wixo stands for?

A Wixo means A wiki theme for hexo.

Q How to generate ToC(Table of Contents) in a certain page?

A Add toc: true in the front-matter.

Q Where can I find your markdown source files of these docs?

A In the source branch.

Q Why some of my notebooks cannot be opened?

A Do not use spaces when naming your notebooks/categories like “Code Book”. Use _ if you have to e.g. “Code_Book”.
entry.summary:
Q What does Wixo stands for?

A

entry.title: Questions and Answers（中文）
entry.content:
Q Wixo 这名字有何含义？

A Wixo 意思是 A wiki theme for hexo 。

Q 如何指定某些页面生成 ToC(Table of Contents) ？

A 在文章头部添加 toc: true 。

Q 从哪里可以找到你的这几篇文档的 Markdown 源码？

A 在项目的 source 分支。

Q 为什么我有些笔记本打不开？

A 给你的笔记本/文章分类取名时不要加空格，例如 “饭 祷 爱” 。如果非加不可，可以考虑使用 _ ，例如 “饭_祷_爱” 。
entry.summary:
Q Wixo 这名字有何含义？

A Wixo

entry.title: 简体中文测试
entry.content:
观自在菩萨，行深般若波罗蜜多时，照见五蕴皆空，度一切苦厄。

舍利子，色不异空，空不异色；色即是空，空即是色。受、想、行、识，亦复如是。

舍利子，是诸法空相，不生不灭，不垢不净，不增不减，是故空中无色，无受、想、行、识；无眼、耳、鼻、舌、身、意；无色、声、香、味、触、法；无眼界，乃至无意识界；无无明，亦无无明尽；乃至无老死，亦无老死尽。无苦、集、灭、道，无智亦无得，以无所得故。

菩提萨埵(duǒ)，依般若波罗蜜多故，心无罣碍(guà ài)。无罣碍，故无有恐怖，远离颠倒梦想，究竟涅盘。三世诸佛，依般若波罗蜜多故，得阿耨多罗三藐三菩提。

故知般若波罗蜜多，大神咒，是大明咒，是无上咒，是无等等咒，能除一切苦，真实不虚。

故说般若波罗蜜多咒， 即说咒曰，

揭谛揭谛 波罗揭谛 波罗僧揭谛 菩提萨婆诃
